name: Meandering Escape
description:
You're in a tank that's careening through a heavily-defended military base, with only its main cannon on your side. Can you get out here, preferably safely? 

Controls:
Left and Right: Rotate the cannon clockwise/counter-clockwise.
Up and Down: Extend the range of your cannon.
Z: Shoot

Credits/Thanks:
Kenney (https://www.kenney.nl/assets), Art assets.
bfxr (https://www.bfxr.net), Sound effects.

-- ꦩ꧀ꦧꦺꦴꦃ, currently in constant regret doing a jam while on a flu
